titleStmt.title: Two sermons viz. I. The diseases that make a stoppage to Englands mercies discovered and attended with their remedies : in a sermon delivered at Margaretson Fish-street-hill, London : II. A preperation for suffering in these plundering times / by William Bridge ...
Sermons. Selections
titleStmt.author: Bridge, William, 1600?-1670.
I. A.

notesStmt.note: Second sermon separated in filmed copy has separate t.p. with title A sermon containing some comfortable directions for svch as have been or may be driven from their houses, goods or country.
Second sermon has separate Wing number.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
